website_summaries.verdict: A larger bath toy caddy that still takes up minimal bathtub space.
pros: A solid option for mesh-style organizers
This one gets top marks for being practical and easy to use
Customers liked the large size, unobtrusive style, and most felt it had good suction
We also like that it's lightweight and easy to pack for traveling
cons: Some felt the suction cups didn't work well and it may not hold heavy toys

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups are poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups lost their suction pretty quickly, sending the bag of toys crashing into the tub in the middle of the night. At this point I simply hang it on hooks, which I could do with just about any mesh bag. Also, this did mildew, I’ve washed it in my washing machine and it’s still stained. I would never repurchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for bath for almost 2 years!
customer_reviews.text: I came back to buy another bag because I'm thinking we need 2 and Amazon said that I bought this bag 1 year and 9 months ago. Awesome! When it's starts to get moldy and discolored I just throw it in the wash with all the bath toys and some bleach. Then let them all hang dry together on the wall above the bathtub and it's ready for next time. How easy is that?! Our bath toys aren't very heavy so I haven't used the extra suction cups for it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom, I read a zillion reviews before purchasing anything. This bath toy organizer has totally lived up to its hype! The extra strong suction cups even stick to our terrible vintage tub surround! I love that the mesh allows our toys to dry and helps prevent mold and mildew from growing, and it holds just the right amount of bath toys!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of the toys all over the damn place. We got a little basket for them. That was dumb. Nasty water build up and moldy toys, just gross and wasteful. This thing is awesome. It allows you kids toys to fully dry out properly. No water build up, no mold so far. Just pure satisfaction and purely clutter free. The bag is huge too! It holds a lot and it hasn’t budged from where we stuck it since we stuck it. So just get the damn bag. It’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have unfortunatelly been unlucky with this product because neither of the suctions could stick to my walls (eventhough I have smooth tiles ...) but I wrote back to the customer service (from which I had received a nice email even before having my product at home) with my issues and they came back to me very rapidly to propose me different solutions and even a full refund !!! I would just conclude saying don't hesitate to buy this net ! Either it works great for you (because the net IS really great and sturdy) either the customer service will do everything to help you !
customer_reviews.author: MomJoh

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a zipper
customer_reviews.text: It’s great at what it does. However, there’s one major flaw, which I noticed the first time we used it. There is no zipper or quick open mechanism to release the toys. It’s quite a pain to have to use two hands to pull out every single toy one by one. I would not purchase it again. I would instead get one that unzips one the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the bathtub organized!
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple product: basically a large mesh bag with two suction cup hooks to secure it. The suction cups are well made and they have held securely for weeks without slipping. The bag works great - we have a number of bath toys as well as foam letters/numbers for sticking on the tile wall, and the bag is big enough to easily hold them all and keep them out of the way (they used to take up a lot of space before!). What a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Ed BTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product replaced a similar product I picked up in the store. Unfortunately the product it replaced kept falling off the walls. I chose this product because the description led me to believe that it would stay put. Due to my previous experience, I chose to immediately use the super suction cups. I've had it in place for over a month now and it still hasn't fallen off! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: JACOB E LEAR

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING SUUUUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly thought I was getting a good deal from reading other reviews, but i’m not sure what they were talking about. This thing sucks. Won’t even stay attached to the side of the shower- BOTH sets of suctions cups SUCK! Don’t waste your time or money. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Sanch

customer_reviews.title: Terrible suction
customer_reviews.text: Holds the toys but good thing it comes with hook suctions and regular suction cups because you need them both. One of each on each side always comes unstuck so it is held up by one hook suction on one side and one regular suction on the other side because the other opposites don’t stay suctioned.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Meisner

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely didn't work, not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Looked easy to put up and had instructions... but despite reading them over and over and following them, the net just wouldn't stay up no matter what. Wouldn't stay up for even 20 seconds. I've got large tiles so that wasn't the issue. All and all, tThere are some things that I'm willing to try to make work, but this just isn't it. Returning and finding something else.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Yes! I was looking for something cute and fun to use, but settled on this plain-jane organizer after reading reviews. I'm so glad I did! It's fantastic. Simple and no frills, but it does its job. The suction cups are super strong- even my 3 year old can't pull the down. It's big enough for several stacking cups, some dinosaurs, and a water baby (what we currently have in it). It washes easily and its low-profile.
customer_reviews.author: This Happy Homeschool

customer_reviews.title: It stays put!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this toy organizer! It has not fallen off the wall at all and it's been up for at least a month. It's half full of toys in the photo because the other half is in the bath. We previously had a plastic toy organizer that you could scope up the toys and it repeatedly fell off the wall. This was the best purchase ever. We also use the extra suction cups for hanging our loofahs. I definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Geil

customer_reviews.title: Works well after 2+ years of use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over two years. It sticks to the wall well, occasionally one suction cup or the other might pop off but I don't recall it every fully coming off the wall ever. It holds a lot of toys without holding water. After two years, it's starting to get discolored from the minerals in our water, so I'm ordering a new one. I'm pleased enough with it that I'm going to buy the same thing again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Clean up that bathtub clutter with this
customer_reviews.text: Clean up that bathtub clutter with this. Great little bag that stores all the little ones bath toys out of the way yet still conveniently accessible at bath time. I love that the mesh bag allows the toys drain and dry out in between uses. The suction cups that are attached to the bag are strong but they also come with some suction cup hooks that are amazing. The bag is worth getting just for those hooks alone.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Nachos

customer_reviews.title: but this one is amazing! The extra strong suction cups it comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have attempted to use several other bath toy organizers and none of them worked, but this one is amazing! The extra strong suction cups it comes with stick to anything and hold no matter what you put in it from toys, shampoo bottles, wash clothes, and soap, it holds it all. The net is massive and if I wanted to I could put my sons, mine, and my husbands shampoos and soaps in it and still have room left. My sons toys dry super fast and haven't grown any mold since using this product. We love it and would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: John and Jody MullinsTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Back for our second (the first is still in use)
customer_reviews.text: We bought the first Toyganizer in February 2017, and as of September 2018, it is still going strong. It has only fallen down ONCE in the past year and a half, and the suction cups have remained clear (no mold). We had another toy holder that sat across the tub, but it is totally gross, so I'm back to buy another Toyganizer for the toys we had been keeping in that thing. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: aat

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but our particular tub set up posed some issues...
customer_reviews.text: The 4 stars (v' 5) is because we have a non-traditional tile around our bathroom shower. It's not the shiny slick kind that you normally see, so this organizer doesn't stay put on this particular tile. Instead, I attached the suction cups to the side of the tub itself, so that when the bath is full, it will sit in the water. When the tub drains, then it will be able to drain as well. It's unfortunate it didn't work out. We already had one of the plastic bath toy holders that spans the width of the tub, but our tub doesn't have sides that will hold it up. We're kind of in between a rock and a hard place...
customer_reviews.author: Peachie

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this has been a great toy organizer. It was easy to install (I used the suggested method of a tiny bit of Vaseline inside the suction cups before hanging) and it holds ALL of the bath toys we have for 2 little girls, including some larger toys such as Barbie dolls. This is the first bath toy organizer we’ve had that can hold every toy. Though we’ve only been using it for a few days, the suction seems very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bath toy storage!
customer_reviews.text: This storage bag is great. It's really roomy and can fit a lot of bath toys. If your kid decides he wants ALL the toys, it's really easy to just flip the bag and dump them. No need to unstick it from the wall. And, most importantly, it sticks really well! Those suction cups aren't going anywhere. It comes with a pair of bonus suction cups that are even stronger -- I stuck one to the tub to test it and it took quite awhile to get it back off again. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Vance Pate

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product as it keeps thing organized in the tub area. It's strong suction cups work well unlike most other ones. This one pops off occassionally but I pop it right back on and we are good to go for another few weeks. It is very large and has the capacity to hold lots of small/medium size toys. My kid loads it up full and it stay in tact!
customer_reviews.author: B. Brew

customer_reviews.title: Good product for bathtub toy organizing.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I though it would be and stays stuck! Has not come undone in over a month and we are using the standard suction cups. It came with some heavy duty alternate ones that we havent had to use. Rather impressed with the company, as I received an email from an account representative after purchase asking if I was 100% satisfied with it, and yada yada. I mean... dude, it's a $13 product, but glad you're more concerned about my happiness with your product than a car dealer or something else a lot more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Comes with two different sets of suction cups!
customer_reviews.text: The tile in my bathroom is actually a fiberglass surround. The used the suction cups that are attached to the net which didn't stick to the wall. BUT this organizer come with an extra set of suction cups that are different and a little more heavy duty and much to my delight, they worked!!! My organizer is full of bath toys and hasn't fallen down all week! Yay! Thank you and very pleased with the size of the net and suction cups that came as extras.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer
customer_reviews.text: We love the net. It keeps our 18month olds bath toys from being all over the tub. After battling with the suction cups and hooks we finally decided to just hang it off our shower caddy. Other then not being able to get them to stick no complaints. The bag is very easy to clean I just throw it in a load of wash with the towels every couple weeks
customer_reviews.author: Leena

customer_reviews.title: Good quality net but bad hangers!
customer_reviews.text: The organizer is nice! good quality net that!!!! but the suction cups never stayed on the bath tiles. I tried to hang the bath sponge which weight nothing and it also fell. I must say that the customer service is amazing. they asked my opinion on this product after I bought it and I wrote it doesn't stick to my bath tiles, so they send me instructions how to put it correctly and when it didn't work, the offered me a refund. Amazing- consider I never asked for a refund. It's the best service I've ever got! I gave it 4 starts since the net is a good one and the service is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: K. shen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution for toy storage
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver! Toys were taking over my bathroom. We were lining them up on the edges and they were of course getting knocked into the bathtub constantly. I love how they can dry now and stay out of the way. I haven’t needed the stronger hooks as of yet so I’m using them for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Ru

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups that come attached are useless to the point of annoying. I cut them off with scissors and used the other set of cam-suction cups that are moderately better. They seem to hold the net to my tile just long enough for me to forget when they fell last. I know it's cheap, but there's also nothing to it. 2 cups, a net, and I expected a bit more quality.
customer_reviews.author: LoneSailor

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product with good suction cups
customer_reviews.text: Finally a product with good suction cups!! I have struggled to find something that can hold ALL of my kids toys, that would allow them to DRY, and that would STAY on the wall out of the way. This organizer has accomplished all of that! It's a great, sturdy product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Was ok. Did not stay on wall with suction cup. I had to tie a knot to the shower bar.
customer_reviews.text: Did not stay in place. With the added toys weight it kept falling down. I had to take it off from the suction cup and tie a knot on a shower bar. The extra suction cup that came with it was very good, but one of them broke as I tried to install. Currently using the toy organizer but I had to improvise.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Garduno

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath toy bag, it's the perfect size to fit all of my daughters bath toys. The suction cups that are attached to it stick really well and don't slide when toys are put into it. It came with two extra suction cups that could be used if the original ones aren't strong enough, we didn't need them for the bag so we are using them to hang out bath scrubs from them. It's really nice knowing that the toys I let my daughter play with in the tub get dried between baths and aren't getting moldy. Everyone that has little ones should have one of these bags for their toys!
customer_reviews.author: FancifulShopper

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful for our kids’ bathtub
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful for our kids’ bathtub! It holds a substantial amount of toys. The suction clip hooks they include as a bonus are pretty crap- they’re not holding anything and they keep falling off the wall. But the suction cups on the bag itself are great and have held all the toys without falling off!
customer_reviews.author: ZMomUtah

customer_reviews.title: Gets moldy
customer_reviews.text: fyi - you may need to de-mold it. We threw it into the wash (next time we'll use bleach) which only got some of the mold off. Suction cups are ok. Not great. Comes with extra super suction-y ones. Not sure if I'd buy again or recommend. Probably a fine solution for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L

customer_reviews.title: Textured shower walls? This is NOT the bag for you!
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice to have a way to attach it to textured shower walls, lost points in my book for that. **Update What a great company!!! After my initial review I was contacted by a customer service representative within 48 hours. The gentleman that contacted me was very nice & offered to remedy the situation right away with a full refund or replacement hooks good for textured shower walls free of charge. I chose the option of the command hooks & am very happy with their hold as well as the bag. It's quite strong & holds so much! I would definitely recommend this a bath toy organization solution.
customer_reviews.author: Kallie

customer_reviews.title: Figured I'd struggle with this like I do other bath accessories...
customer_reviews.text: ...but I didn't! This is the perfect bath toy organizer. It's roomy and the suction cups are extra strong. We have other suction-cupped bath accessories (bath mat and padded arm rest) that come undone or slide around when using but this seems to stay put. I moved it around a few times before finding the perfect place and had a hard time prying the cups off of the bath tile each time (which is a GOOD thing). The cups haven't moved in the couple of weeks I've had this on the wall - no slipping or sliding. Toys seem to dry off relatively quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The clear suction cups it came with didn't stick that great to our tile but it also came with some other suction cups and they work much better. I love how large the pouch is.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie L.

customer_reviews.title: The last toy pouch like this that we bought broke after about 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a few months now, and it has held up well. The last toy pouch like this that we bought broke after about 6 weeks, but this one is going strong. It doesn't fall down and still looks good as new. It also came with two bonus hooks, which I use to hold my daughter's animal-shaped washcloth and my shower puff. It took a few tries to get the second hook to stick (it was in a bit of an awkward spot, I guess), but now that they are there they have stayed put for at least 2 months without issues. They hold a heavy wet washcloth without any trouble. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bluebird

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad we bought this to organize my daughter's bath toys! They were always falling off the edge of the tub and it was super annoying, before that I had a big "bowl" but the water didn't drain, which isn't sanitary. I also like that it hangs in the bathtub because I have my daughter put her own toys away before we get her out!
customer_reviews.author: New mom

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick - even with bonus suctions
customer_reviews.text: This does not stick to the wall AT ALL. My walls are clean, I’ve done the necessary cleaning etc. and it won’t stay up ever. They included two bonus suction cups as I speculate they knew they had a faulty product so threw those in to try to fix and called it “bonus.” These don’t work either! I don’t understand all the positive reviews for this item. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith A Lee

customer_reviews.title: I loved the concept of the bag to prevent toys being ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the concept of the bag to prevent toys being on the ground and mold issues. The rubber stickys were not very strong. I just wanted a stronger suction cup for my bathroom that has tile. I wrote the customer service and they were excellent at answering and gave me a refund without me even asking. Their customer service is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Love this organizer! No fall offs--a dream!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is great! I had no problem with it's suctioning to my tile bathroom. I was able to use the regular suction cups for one of my bathrooms, however for my other bathroom, it defiantly needed the 2 heavy duty hooked suction cups. No falls or slide offs what so ever! I have now purchased 2 total and would recommend by far so sure!
customer_reviews.author: Peter McKenna

customer_reviews.title: The Toyganizer is an EXCELLENT product! The company is very involved with their ...
customer_reviews.text: The Toyganizer is an EXCELLENT product! The company is very involved with their products and even send a personal email to you upon ordering to let you know they stand behind their products 100% and to contact them if anything is wrong. The organizer is a great product with sturdy suction hooks. It is much larger than I expected and easily holds all of my sons tub toys. I am looking forward to a less cluttered bathroom and not having to worry about mold, mildew filled toys. Thanks so much for this awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: awtn0219

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and company seems to truly care about customer satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Just what my daughter's bathtub needed to keep toys clean and organized. I purchased the toyganizer in pink. It seems to be well made and the suction cups are no joke! Very high quality. I am mostly impressed with the actual business and that is another reason I am giving 5/5 stars. I was sent an email from Toyganizer hoping the product was everything I was looking for. I appreciate a company reaching out to customers in a non intrusive manner and my email exchange with them was very pleasant and professional.
customer_reviews.author: LouieBlue

customer_reviews.title: Normal suction cups ineffecient, stronger ones hold.
customer_reviews.text: I definitely struggled with this toy organizer at first and almost just gave up. We don't have tile, but have that generic plasticy tub surround so maybe that's why it didn't work so well. The normal suction cups were useless...didn't stick for more than 5 seconds with an empty bag. The stronger suction cups that came with it ended up sticking after falling one time. The second time I made sure to wet them more first and that seemed to do the trick. It's been several days now and the toys have hung nicely without falling.
customer_reviews.author: AKinn

customer_reviews.title: Product functional but type of placement surface  is important. Fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this product may not work on your shower if it is tiles or textured in an odd way. This is simple and easy to put together but unfortunately, fell down several times. However, the customer service I received from the company has been exceptional. I emailed them and they offered an alternative solution or a full money back. I was impressed with their conflict resolution and quickness to accommodate my needs. That's why I'm giving 4 stars even though the product didn't work for me. I'm sure it works well on the right type of shower.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi N.

customer_reviews.title: Use the additional suctions if it's not sticking.
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time with the suction. Currently using two different suctions since I couldn't get one to stay. I used Vaseline and cleaned the shower wall. So far it's been good.
customer_reviews.author: MJV

customer_reviews.title: Great simple solution that works
customer_reviews.text: We've only had it for a week but so far it's great. It really holds to the wall securely (we have basic 4" tiles) and toys seem to dry well when they are in it. It came with detailed mounting instructions for how to clean the wall and get a secure deal with the suction cups....which I did not follow but it's holding well anyway. I'm looking forward to see if the mesh bag stays mildew free, as that's the problem I've had with other toy holders.
customer_reviews.author: RaeLehman

customer_reviews.title: Creative and cost effective toy storage solution
customer_reviews.text: My Bathroom looks so organized thanks to this toy organizer! It provides a place for me to keep my child's toys, and the mesh allows for them to air out. I'm excited to have a bathroom where I can feel proud to have guests come over and use, and still let my daughter feel like it is her space as well. What a creative solution. I also love it because it holds quiet a bit of toys without taking up much space in my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the toys clean, dry, organized
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy organizer. The suction cups actually work. The organizer holds more than I thought it would (it holds quite a lot). And the best part is is that the toys dries up between bath times. The customer service is wonderful, as well. They contacted me to make sure everything was perfect. The toy organizer comes with extra suction cups in case the original ones do not work. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: jenk

customer_reviews.title: Junk, suction cups dont work
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money, the suction cups dont stay up and neither does the hook suction cups. It's a good size bag and it washes easily but what's the point when its constantly falling off the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to work properly, but maybe you'll have a better time with it?
customer_reviews.text: Despite following the instructions, only one suction cup seems to work via sticking to the wall, whereas the other does not. We've tried multiple times to get it to work properly and haven't been successful. Could just be us, but figured it's worth noting on here for anyone on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel & Katie

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT + CUSTOMER SERVICE = :) me
customer_reviews.text: I bought the toy organizer and it it worked absolutely perfectly. My son has A TON of bath toys and it held them all up with no problem. Fast forward to half a year later, we moved houses and I was having problems getting it to stick to the new bathroom. I emailed them for any suggestions to get it to stick. They responded immediately!!! Not only that, they offered to send me command hooks to help it stick. Since they were out of command hooks, they refunded my money, no questions asked. Wow! What amazing customer service. If you aren’t happy with the product, they will definitely take care of you
customer_reviews.author: Miles Capo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous after reading reviews and not sure if this would work. At first, when I got it it would not stick. The seller had already personally emailed me to see if I liked the product. They gave me some tips and offered some options for replacement/return and then lo and behold....we used the extra strong suction cups and it has been up for a few weeks now. Keeps the bathroom organized and toys dry! Love it. Great company!! (In the picture, I have the old suction ups still attached because initially I thought I might have to return product....now I'm just too lazy to take them off) No need to return the item though! It's working well.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best company to deal with. Neither the regular or heavy duty suction cups would work for me. After contacting the company they sent me FREE bath command hooks that work perfect! The fabric is durable and the bag is big enough to fit a lot of toys! I really want to commend the company on their customer service. They really wanted to make me happy and make sure I was able to use their product. They are by far the most courteous I have ever had to deal with. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place even with prodding and pulling from my ...
customer_reviews.text: Stays in place even with prodding and pulling from my toddler, lots of room for the bath toys, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: joy314

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: The regular suction cups are strong and the company even sends a set of super strong suction cups (which we didn't need!) The net is strong and does a great job holding the toys. It is large enough to put a ton of toys in, but still fits on the end of the tub. The seller also emailed a couple times to make sure we were happy with the product and made it clear that they would be willing to do whatever it takes to make us happy if something wasn't right. Great product, great seller, great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Jared C.

customer_reviews.title: Just a mesh bag
customer_reviews.text: The idea is cool and cute, but it is not practical. It is so wide and does not hold that much. Once you hang it on the hooks, the front of it makes it hard to even toss in toys. It's not flexible at all.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyne Ohanian

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. As a single dad I needed something to ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. As a single dad I needed something to keep the toys off the tub base. This is larger than I expected. It's about 14-16" wide and up to 5 " deep 7" high. And it comes with two extra super hooks. My daughter uses them for shower cap and sponge on string thing.
customer_reviews.author: The man in room V

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I like that this bag doesn't create mold. It keeps the toys out of the way. It's not as easy to put each toy in the bag as it would be to store them in a hard plastic container, but it is worth it to have the net design that allows air movement. The sturdy suction cups work great. There are additional suction cups that seem superfluous--it would be nice if they were removable. Only the super strong ones are removable. I'm not sure how I'll wash the bag with the suction cups attached, but I guess it will be ok.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great product and awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: At first the bag wasn't staying up in the shower I got it for , but I realized it was the surface of that particular shower. I did try it in another shower and filled it with shampoo bottles and it worked great. Since I needed it in the other bathroom, I contacted Toyganizer and they quickly sent me some extra suctions with Hooks ( more powerful) and they are working so far in the shower I was having problems in! The bag is big and light ! I really like the product and the customer service is exceptional!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Stock

customer_reviews.title: Great toy bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the mesh toy bag but I was not impressed with the suction cups (I have a tile shower) so I purchased command hooks to hand them instead so it isn't falling 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: KLovesAmazon

customer_reviews.title: the product itself otherwise appeared to be of good quality and the customer service was unbeatably excellent
customer_reviews.text: Well, unfortunately this product didn't work for me. I have tiles on my bathroom wall. In retrospect I discovered there is kind of a textured uneven surface to them which I now realize is probably why the suction cups wouldn't hold. However, the product itself otherwise appeared to be of good quality and the customer service was unbeatably excellent. If you have smooth tiles I think this product would probably be great
customer_reviews.author: Mfb231

customer_reviews.title: Still sticking, months later
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a few months before reviewing this, because I have had bath toy organizers that stay up for the first few weeks, perfectly, then suddenly refuse to stick. I have to say I continue to be impressed with the Toyganizer. We currently have 3 toy bags in our bathtub, and since the others keep falling, I keep stacking more and more heavy bath toys into the Toyganizer, and it takes them like a champ. My only caution is that the extra hooks that came with the Toyganizer did not work as well as the Toyganizer itself. But overall, this is the most impressive bath toy suction that I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gellar

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing holds a ton of toys, and actually holds more weight that I thought it would. My only real complaint is with getting this to stick, once stuck, it's on there. It makes cleaning the tub a little more challenging (to get it off in the first place and then back on), but it's well worth it. The bonus suction cups are super suckers as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: It hold a LOT of toys and the suction cups are substantial and hold the weight well. The only thing I don't like is that the bag is completely attached to the suction cups which doesn't allow you to dump the toys in the bath without removing the whole thing from the wall. Wish they just hooked on instead. It did come with a second set of suction cups that do have hooks, but it requires you to cut off the original suction cups. It does the trick, but could be better
customer_reviews.author: LK Loves

customer_reviews.title: Prevents mildew
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. The suction cups didn't work on our tile-which I somewhat expected. The company offered to send alternatives or command adhesive for free. Even offered to refund my money (which I didn't accept). The bag is great quality and what I was really interested in to avoid mildew issues. I've had it for a month or so now and it does the trick. No more mildew smell on the bath toys!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Look no further! This is the one
customer_reviews.text: This is third bath toy holder we have tried, and oak happy to say our search has ended. The normal suction cups are fantastic, but just in case they're not enough, they send an additional two heavy duty suction cups which are amazing as well. I use them for other uses in the bathroom to hold up whatever I need. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alfons C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this toy holder auctioned to my shower wall the first try. It hasn’t fallen or moved since I have had it. I’ve been using it since December. This is exactly what I wanted! It is very sturdy and fits all of my daughters bath toys. She has a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ramos

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. I took away one star because the basic suction cups that come with it are worthless but the stronger ones (that also come with it) have held up wonderfully. It has been hanging in my bathroom for a couple of weeks now, full of my sons' toys, getting almost daily use and it hasn't fallen off of the wall once. I have a tile shower.
customer_reviews.author: Julia P.

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot, sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: Great! Only thing we don’t like is that it’s a stiff bag, so you can’t pull down the opening to grab toys from the floor. Gotta stand up while bathing the LO and grab toys quickly before she stands up. Otherwise, the suction cups hold a full load of toys! We have a smooth plastic tub wall.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt hold up.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product when I first received it but unfortunately it hasn't held up like I was hoping. After about 2 months it has taken on a yellow/ orange color and no amount of washing or bleach can get it to come out. It serves its purpose of hold in that I toys but the stained color makes it look less than appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays up!
customer_reviews.text: I put this up before my baby was born 3 months ago and I haven’t touched it other than putting toys in it and it’s stayed up this whole time.
customer_reviews.author: George Osorio

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Worth the extra $$. I have had this for almost a year, and it has no mildew, rips, tears, etc. I did have trouble getting the suction cups to stay on my travertine tile, but Toyganizer sent some different hooks that worked perfectly (and it was probably six-months later when I asked.)
customer_reviews.author: K. Wink

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stick regardless of what I tried
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give more stars but it just doesn't stick. I followed the instructions by cleaning the area before hand to ensure the best suction possible. After putting 2 small items in in, one suction began to slide down while the other one stuck fairly well. I attempted to use it in a different area thinking it would make a difference. No matter where I placed it, the suction would not stick and out of nowhere it would fall off of the wall. I will try to use it in a different room to avoid the hassle of having to return it. A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pinay05

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, modified installation
customer_reviews.text: We promptly removed the suction cups. We have this installed on the wall of our bathroom just below the towel rack, hanging from 2 command strips hooks. Much more stable installation, plus allow for a drier environment for the toys to actually dry out in between uses.
customer_reviews.author: William J

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective organizer
customer_reviews.text: Works great - suction cups are gripping to the tile with no problem, and I like that extra suction hooks are included - nice bonus. Simple, white design is attractive and well made; mesh allows quick drying, and the pouch is nice and big. Holds a fairly large toy boat plus other floaty toys without any issues thus far. The company really stands by its product and follows up to make sure you are 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Red-Eyed Zhaan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing all of my daughter's bath toys. This organizer is a decent size which I was very pleased with. The suction cups are holding great and the two extra hooks included are an added bonus. Every other bath toy organizer I've tried either gets gross with the constant wet dry or the suction cups never hold. I love that this organizer is all mesh so that it will drain and dry easily.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Mildew After 6 Months :(
customer_reviews.text: The Good: This product is sturdy and hangs up quite easily. It is well-constructed with no tearing, despite holding many many bath toys. The Bad: Mildew. Yuck. After only 6 months, the top edging of the Toyganizer has dark mildew inside. You can see it, but you cannot clean it off.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy C

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy holder for the bath tub. The heavy duty suction cups that are included are perfect. Since I put it up about 2 weeks, it has not fallen off the wall once.. and that is with a 6, 5, and 1.5 year old using it! And it holds tons of toys!! I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty

customer_reviews.title: The quality on this product is great and the suction cups hold up very well
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased shortly after buying the bath styrofoam alphabet & numbers. The quality on this product is great and the suction cups hold up very well. It's been several months since we purchased it and the suction cups have not come undone, which leads me to believe we should probably clean that area (gross). I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to order this based on the excellent reviews (was out of stock for a while) and it was well worth the wait! The suction cups are fantastic and the net holds a lot of toys! Everything dries well and there are no mold or staining issues. We have previously owned a Boon Bath frog and were very disappointed with the way it didn't hold up on the tile, and there is very little room for holding toys. We will be recommending the Bath Toy Organizer by Toyganizer to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: ellibot

customer_reviews.title: 3 years later....
customer_reviews.text: 3 year update, a little mildew at edges but I hadn’t been faithful washing. Still holding lots of toys Strong!!! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kristianna S.

customer_reviews.title: works for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: With the straps they can be hung up. I use this instead of the suction. Can be used for various things too.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't stick to my bathroom tiles, so we ...
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't stick to my bathroom tiles, so we have to stick it to the actual tub, and that kind of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Stinking hipsters
customer_reviews.text: These things are just as much for the parents as they are the kids. While giving my 1 year old son a bath I stick them all over his head while he is playing and he never notices it. He just laughs while were laughing at him. It is a great game to us but he probably won't think so in a few years. Nowadays you have to knock these hipsters down a level or two. Always thinking they are better than us.
customer_reviews.author: Trash Panda

customer_reviews.title: This one is great. The extra suction cups are also really great
customer_reviews.text: You say to yourself "it's just a mesh bag that hangs from the wall". But how many junky ones that are maybe a few bucks cheaper end up falling off the wall every other day, or don't quite look as well made? Plenty I'm sure. This one is great. The extra suction cups are also really great. The seller was also very courteous and checked in to make sure that the suction cups were sticking. For a simple product the customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: K K

customer_reviews.title: Good: This stays put on the bathroom wall
customer_reviews.text: Good: This stays put on the bathroom wall. Bad: I find that it takes efforts to put toys in and out of the pocket as the opening is always laid flat against the wall. I would get the plastic ones that look like a bucket, which will make it easier to access toys and put them back in without having to manually open the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by suction cups!
customer_reviews.text: Great storage for bath toys. Mesh netting lets the water drain and dry. I am pleasantly surprised at how well the suction cups are holding up. They have been on our plastic tub surround for a few weeks without budging. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: APC

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Toyganizer!
customer_reviews.text: The kids having fun in the bathtub is super important!! As a Dad there is a lot of joy seeing all the smiles that toys in tub bring my kids, but I also like to keep things tidy and organized after all the fun (and splash chaos! Haha). The Toyganizer caught my eye online and I am so glad that I tried this product! It's large sucker pads ensure that it locks securely to bath tiles and the large mesh bag is big enough to hold plenty of bath toys. I also believe this product is very competitively price so, bottom line: I highly recommend this product. Thank you Charles
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Charles W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: REALLY Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Game changer for bath time organization. Super strong suction cups stay stuck to the tub, which was my main concern. The mesh is nicer (if that's possible for mesh ;) ) - it's not the super cheap scratchy kind, which I appreciate. Holds a good amount of bath toys. Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SML

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have used it about a week now and it's filled with a lot of lightweight toys and a LOT of foam letters! I used the tip I saw to clean the surface and the suction cup with alcohol prior to sticking and so far it's not budging.. Even with a one year old tugging on it. It's a good size and it seems to really allow the toys to air dry pretty well even when they're piled on one another. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: but you can hang these with the suction cups or just use it like us as a place to put toys in
customer_reviews.text: We quit hanging ours up in the bathtub because we had SO many toys in it, but you can hang these with the suction cups or just use it like us as a place to put toys in. You can wash it and it's mesh so it dries out without smelling.
customer_reviews.author: G&L

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate solution for storing tub toys!
customer_reviews.text: The Toyganizer really works as described! My granddaughters had a tub full of toys, laying in the tub wet, and in the way for the rest of us to shower or clean the tub. I hung the Toyganizer easily; the suction cups are awesome. Plunked in the toys, and, Voila! They have a safe place to dry, and I have a safe place to shower. Win-win. It easily held all the toys and looks super. Another fantastic product made in America!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Loves to read

customer_reviews.title: Great toy organizer
customer_reviews.text: Great toy organizer. Fits a lot of bath toys and the suction cups are strong enough to hold all of them up without falling down. I also like that it doesn't take up too much space in the bath. It also comes wtih extra suction cups that come with it are great for hanging up other bath necessities.
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: but this is by far the best solution we have found
customer_reviews.text: We have tried plastic baskets, etc, but this is by far the best solution we have found. Makes bath time MUCH easier. Suction cups have held up and not failed yet, even with the basket completely loaded. Just scrub down your walls so they are nice and smooth/clean before you adhere them...
customer_reviews.author: Nurnie

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy organizer!
customer_reviews.text: The attached suction cups did not stick well to our tile, as there is ever so slight a texture on the tile. However, the added super suction cups work like a dream. The mesh basket is big enough for all my child's bath toys, and it being mesh all around the toys dry out and don't mold!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lund

customer_reviews.title: This toy organizer is perfect for my child's bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This toy organizer is perfect for my child's bathroom. I have twin daughters, so they have a lot of bath toys. The mesh bag is a good size and holds all of their bath toys. The suction cups are strong and do not slide or fall off the wall like the previous bath organizer that I had. I love having all of their bath toys in one place because it makes cleanup easy and it is easy for the girls to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Love the Toyganizer!
customer_reviews.text: The Toyganizer is the best bath tub toy organizer I have come across! (And with other brands, there's been more than a few duds) The large size, easy access to the toys, the color choices, and best of all, the super strong suction cups - it's all awesome!! I will definitely be buying another one. ...Thank you to the Toyganizer company for such a great product & for your update/shipping status emails (fast shipping!)... I am impressed that they really strive for complete customer satisfaction - they made sure we received & were completely happy with our Toyganizer. :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction cups.
customer_reviews.text: After trying several locations in the bath, one side of this just kept falling. Didn’t matter which suction cup set we used. Not strong enough so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is like NO other on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow. Customer service is like NO other on Amazon. When I received my product the owner emailed me to thank me and to message him if anything ever went wrong. A few months later, the suction did stop working and he sent a replacement to me for free! What?! Who does this. I hope this company goes far!!!!! Not enough like them. I love the product as well. It keeps all my daughter's toys super fresh and dry and no mildew smell!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Martin

customer_reviews.title: Stuck great to glass but our tile is not smooth tile ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Toyganizer reached out to me based on my below comment and provided a 100% refund since the suctions did not work on our tile. For that reason alone, I would recommend this product over other suctions as if it doesn't work you have no return hassles. Did not stick to our tile. Stuck great to glass but our tile is not smooth tile so it doesn't work for our needs (no suction cup would). This will only work on smooth surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of All Trades

product_meta.title: Toyganizer Bath Toy Organizer + 2 Bonus Strong Hooked Suction Cups, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe bath Toyganizer is a simple way to organize and store your child's bath toys.
feature_bullets: BATH TOY STORAGE SOLUTION: The bath Toyganizer is a simple solution for getting bath toys off the floor and into one convenient location. Putting toys away in the bath toy organizer is easy and keeps your bathroom organized and clean.
KEEP TOYS DRY: The bag's mesh netting lets water drain from your child's toys and allows air to dry them.

EXCELLENT SUCTION: The bag’s clear suction cups stick well for most of our customers. The clear suction cups are thick and strong, holding their shape well even after long term use. Two bonus heavy-duty hooked suction cups are included if more suction is needed for your tile. Or to hang other bath products, such as a loofah.

SPACE SAVER: The large bag (18in x 14in) will hold a lot of toys and save space in your toddler’s bathtub. When bath time is over, the bag stays out of the way better than a plastic bath toy holder, allowing for more room in the shower. The simple white design is perfect for shared bathrooms.
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: Our world class customer service wants you to be 100% Satisfied with your new bath toy organizer. Contact us at any time in the future if we can be of help.

specifications.Best uses: Toy Storage, Organization, Bathtub Holder, Shower Caddy, Misc Item Storage
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,847 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
